729578f-a.title: Richmond: St. Lukes Avenue - Hervey Street
729578f-a.text:
St. iukes Avenue, at the N. E. corner of Hervey
Street. The house belonged to S. Marshall, according
to Beers's map of 1874.
April 30, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
